Method Detail

sgetAppModuleFactory

public static AppBase.AppModuleFactory sgetAppModuleFactory()
Convenience access functions. The app can get to any of the controllers, the scene, or the model via these accessors (and anything can get the app instance.) These are static accessors that get the relevant pieces through the active frame (in this case, the mainFrame.) Override these to get derived versions (means you have to override JAppBase, of course.)

See Also:
DocumentFrameBase, StructureModel, org.rcsb.mbt.appController.ViewsController, org.rcsb.mbt.appController.UpdateViewController, org.rcsb.mbt.appController.DocController, org.rcsb.mbt.glscene.controller.appController.SceneController

isSimpleViewer

public boolean isSimpleViewer()
Temporary: Application indication hacks - app overrides these so the subsystems can modify behavior, accordingly. Goal is to remove them.

Returns:
- whether the app is the top-level app indicated by the call.
